[gasps] Oh, I'm sorry, dear. I didn't see you there.

I'm fine. Just a little blue, I guess.

translation.en: Probably shouldn't have started looking through this in the first place.
translation.vi: ‎Lẽ ra ngay từ đầu, không nên xem nó.

translation.en: What is it?
I call it our memory book.

translation.en: Christmas cards, wedding programs, notes from guests.

‎Thiệp Giáng sinh, chương trình đám cưới,

translation.en: [chuckles] Thank you.
You are beautiful too.
I like to remind myself every now and then

‎khu nhà nghỉ nhỏ xinh này

translation.en: Especially…

‎- Cháu tưởng Jake không muốn bán.
‎- Jake có thể sẽ hết cách.

‎đây có thể là Giáng Sinh cuối cùng
‎của nhà bác ở đây

‎Dù sao thì
‎đó là điều cháu không có gì phải lo.

Can you put that back in Jake's desk when you're done?

translation.en: -Sure. -Thank you.
-Hey, what's going on? -Oh, hi. The drawer was stuck.

‎- Này, chuyện gì thế?
‎- Ồ, chào. Ngăn kéo bị kẹt.

translation.en: Yeah, I've been meaning to fix that.
This is really beautiful. -Why don't you put it on the tree? -Um…

translation.en: Because it…
I'm not ready to put it up.
Oh, I'm sorry. It's really none of my business.

translation.en: No, I'm… I'm sorry. I just… It's…
translation.vi: ‎Không, tôi xin lỗi. Tôi chỉ… Nó…

translation.en: We… We… Um, Carla and I bought it together, and…
translation.vi: ‎Carla và tôi đã cùng mua nó và…

translation.en: And then she got sick.
And…
I don't… I don't wanna get rid of it,
but I can't bring myself to put it on the tree. So, I…
translation.vi:
‎nhưng tôi không thể treo nó lên cây.
‎Nên tôi…

‎Tôi phải đi vì tôi sắp đến muộn

Yeah. You know, Summit Springs has one every year

translation.vi: ‎cho các gia đình đang gặp khó khăn nên…

translation.en: That's really sweet.
Yeah, well, you know, every kid deserves something for Christmas.

‎Dịp Giáng Sinh,
‎mọi đứa trẻ đều xứng đáng có gì đó.

translation.en: Do you need any help?
Yes, that would be nice.
-How's it going? -I just finished my first one.

‎- Tôi vừa làm xong cái đầu tiên.

translation.en: Wow!
Okay. Um, pretty good. I'll show you a trick.

‎Tôi sẽ cho cô một mẹo.

translation.en: Wrapping technique shouldn't require more than three pieces of tape.

‎Kỹ thuật gói quà

translation.en: So you do it like this,
and then like that.
And like this.
Very good. [giggles]
-Told you. -[Sierra laughs]
-Jacob! I'm so happy you're here. -Oh!

‎Louise, cô biết tôi sẽ

‎- Có vẻ như anh đã có.
‎- Đây là Sarah.

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -Merry Christmas.
translation.vi:
‎- Giáng Sinh vui.
‎- Giáng Sinh vui.

[man] Jake! We need help sorting things out! All right. Um, I'll be right back.

‎- Jake, ta cần làm mấy việc!

-Merry Christmas. Thank you so much. -There you go.

‎- Cầm lấy.

I can't even count how many charities he's helped out in town.

‎giúp vô số tổ chức từ thiện

‎Một lần nữa,

‎Mọi người rất tốt.

think you're going to remember any of this when you get your memory back?

‎cô sẽ nhớ lại chuyện này

We are standing under the mistletoe.

You know, maybe we shouldn't do this.

translation.en: That would be unfortunate.
For both of us.
Yeah. Well…
-I'm almost done. -Yes.
Morning!
-Morning! -Good morning.
I have an idea on how we can help the North Star.

translation.en: I've got the contacts for almost every guest we've had

‎Bác có thông tin liên lạc
‎của hầu hết mọi vị khách

translation.vi: ‎đã đến đây ba thập kỷ qua.

translation.en: -[Sierra] This is perfect. -Mm-hmm.
What's it for?
A North Star fundraiser.
Cool. Have you talked to dad about it?

translation.en: No, absolutely not.
-[Sierra] What? -You heard me.
translation.vi:
‎- Cái gì?
‎- Tôi đã nói rồi.

translation.vi: ‎Không đời nào tôi gây quỹ để cứu nhà nghỉ.

translation.en: No. It won't be a fundraiser. It'll be like a Christmas flashback party.

‎Không. Sẽ không gây quỹ.

translation.en: Maybe I do.
You don't mean that.
Look, I'm tired of struggling with this place.

I'm tired of wondering how we'll make it to the end of the month.

‎vì tự hỏi
‎làm thế nào để trụ đến cuối tháng.

‎- Nghĩ về mọi ký ức anh đã tạo ra.
‎- Tôi luôn nghĩ. Mọi lúc.

‎Cô còn không nhớ nổi tên cô.

Okay, look, I…
It's not you.
Okay, actually, it is you.

translation.en: And, yes, you're right. This place does have a lot of memories for me.

Come in.
Everything all right?
Yeah.
What's wrong?
Nothing. Nothing, just…
Is it Sarah?
I know it's hard, especially this time of year.

I just… I don't really know what I'm doing anymore.

Jake.
It's okay to let go.
Sarah. We're making snowflakes. Want to come help me?

You can't be.
I'm afraid so.

[Avy] Dad.
What is that?
Something I've been saving for the right moment.

translation.en: But we need Sarah to help us put it up.

translation.en: Please.
But you said…
I know, but I don't wanna do this without you.

‎Anh không muốn
‎làm việc này mà không có em.

-[Jake] How about that? -[Avy] And… perfect.
[laughs] It's beautiful, Jake.
You know what this place needs right now?

-[Sierra and Alejandra laughing] -All right, let's do it! Let's go!
All right, a little bit closer together.
On the count of three, "Merry Christmas."

[all] Merry Christmas!
All right, you guys enjoy the slopes.
All right. Printing.
Christmas Eve, come to North Star.

Here you go. Merry Christmas. Christmas party at the North Star.

-Thank you, my friend. -Yeah.
These are the best canned beans

Ralph! Have you considered starting a survival blog?

Hot. [chuckles]
Yeah, they got a little kick. It can sneak up on you.

Big kick!
Not very sneaky. [groans]
[man] He's walking in now.
Hi! I just got to the hotel. So, give me a call when you get this.

Terry?
Mr. Belmont. [chuckling nervously] Hello, you're back.

‎- Xin lỗi sếp.

What?
I asked you to take care of her while she was here.

‎Tôi đã bảo anh để ý Sierra

‎"Hôm đó?" Anh nói
‎anh đã không thấy con tôi bốn ngày qua?

‎Vâng, tôi chỉ nghĩ cô ấy và Fairchild

translation.en: -We. -We found this note.

‎- Chúng tôi.
‎- Chúng tôi thấy lời nhắn này.

translation.en: Search every inch of the resort.

You tell them that I want them to find my daughter.
translation.vi: ‎Rằng tôi muốn họ tìm con gái tôi.

translation.en: Right.
We're gonna need a search party. Got some knuckleheads lost in the pass.

‎Ta cần đội tìm kiếm.

Yeah?
Are you almost ready, dear?
I'm just trying to find something to wear.

translation.en: Well, actually, that's why I'm here.

translation.en: I hope it fits.
Oh my gosh. Thank you so much. You didn't have to.

You make Jake smile.
He hasn't done that in a long time.
Oh! I brought you a pair of shoes too.

translation.en: Thank you.
-See you downstairs? -Okay.

‎- Gặp cháu ở dưới nhà nhé?
‎- Vâng.

‎Sao? Không thể chấp nhận được!

‎- Hắn săn trộm trên đất chính phủ.
‎- Anh ấy đã cứu mạng tôi.

translation.en: You'll have to arrest me too.
Ted?

translation.en: What do you mean, sweetie?
When Grandma and I were at The Wishing Tree,
translation.vi: ‎Khi bà và con ở Cây Điều Ước,

translation.en: I didn't make a wish for myself.
I made it for you, Dad.
You gave your wish up for me?

translation.en: I wished for you to find someone to love.
translation.vi: ‎Con đã ước bố tìm được người để yêu.

translation.en: You take such good care of all of us.

Avy, honey, um… I just… It's just not that easy.

translation.en: -Well, yeah, but it's not-- -Did you ever tell her?

‎- Ừ, nhưng…
‎- Bố đã nói cho cô ấy?

There's still time, Dad.
I think you should tell her.
-Go get dressed. Go tell her. Let's go! -Okay, all right.

‎- Được rồi.

translation.en: I'll take the snowmobile!
Maybe not.
Dad?
What is that?
What is that?
What is this doing here?
-Did you and Grandma do this? -No. Where did it come from?

‎- Con và bà đã làm việc này?
‎- Không. Nó đến từ đâu?

‎Bố không biết.
‎Balthazar sẽ ra đây. Con đi cùng?

translation.en: -You bet! -All right.
My Christmas wish.
It is coming true.
A couple of hours from now, we'll be taking selfies on a beautiful beach.

-Um, I'll meet you at the car. -Don't be too long.
translation.vi:
‎- Gặp anh ngoài xe.

‎- Vâng.
‎- Không muốn lỡ chuyến bay.

translation.en: Daddy?
I'm really sorry I didn't get a chance to tell you

translation.en: about me and Tad, the engagement.
translation.vi: ‎về con và Tad, lễ đính hôn.

translation.en: Oh, it's okay, honey.
You know, the most important thing to me is that you're happy.
translation.vi:
‎Điều quan trọng nhất với bố

translation.en: You are happy, aren't you?
Yeah.
About the job.
Don't worry about the job. It'll be here when you get back.

‎Đừng lo công việc.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Vice President of Atmosphere? You just did that to take care of me.
translation.vi:
‎Phó Chủ tịch Khí quyển.
‎Bố làm thế chỉ vì lo cho con.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, maybe a little, but I--
And I love you for it, and I'll always be your daughter.
translation.vi:
‎Con yêu bố vì điều đó,
‎con sẽ luôn là con gái bố.

translation.en: I just… I need to find my own way. I hope you're not angry.
translation.vi:
‎Con chỉ cần tìm hướng đi riêng.
‎Hy vọng bố không giận.

translation.en: Angry?
No.
I don't think I've ever been more proud of you.
Really?
I told you I promised your mother that I'd take care of you.

‎Bố đã kể cho con
‎bố hứa với mẹ con là bố sẽ chăm sóc con.

translation.en: Well…
Looks like you're starting to take care of yourself.

translation.en: I love you, Dad.
I love you too.
Your mother would be so proud of you.

[Sierra] Okay.
All right.

-[ringing] -Merry Christmas, North Star Lodge.

North Star Lodge?

we're sold out!

On Christmas Day?

Wait!
-Much better. -[car engine starts]
Wait! Wait! Wait! Wait! Stop the car. Don't move.
Hold on!

Happy Christmas.

[gasps] Shoot. Oh my God.
